title: Warm Jackets for Street Children
description: Donate winter jackets to help children living on the streets stay warm during the cold nights.

title: Blankets for Homeless Families
description: Your blanket donation will give homeless families warmth and protection this winter.

title: Sweaters for Elderly People
description: Support the elderly by donating sweaters to keep them safe from the freezing cold.

title: Winter Clothes for School Kids
description: Help underprivileged school kids attend classes without suffering from the winter chill.

title: Shawls for Women in Villages
description: Donate shawls to women in rural villages to protect them from cold weather.

title: Gloves and Socks for Workers
description: Support daily wage workers by donating gloves and socks to keep them warm during long shifts.

title: Winter Kit for Flood Victims
description: Provide a full winter kit including sweaters, blankets, and gloves for families affected by floods.

title: Reuse Old Winter Clothes
description: Donate your old but usable winter clothes to help low-income communities.

title: Warm Clothes for Newborn Babies
description: Protect newborn babies from the harsh winter by donating warm clothes and blankets.
